validation.required: This field cannot be left empty. Please provide a value.
validation.invalid-email: The email address entered is not valid. Please check and try again.
validation.invalid-url: The URL entered is not valid. Please enter a correct web address.
validation.invalid-string: The input format is not valid. Please enter valid text.
validation.invalid-type: Invalid input type. Expected {expected}, but received {received}.
validation.too-small: The input is too short. It must be at least {minimum} characters long.
validation.too-big: The input is too long. It must not exceed {maximum} characters.
validation.number-too-small: The value is too small. It must be at least {minimum}.
validation.number-too-big: The value is too large. It must not exceed {maximum}.
validation.invalid-literal: A specific value of '{expected}' is required.
validation.unrecognized-keys: The following fields are not recognized: {keys}.
validation.invalid-union: The input does not match any of the allowed formats.
validation.invalid-enum: Invalid selection. Please choose one of the following: {options}.
validation.invalid-arguments: The function received invalid arguments. Please check the inputs.
validation.invalid-return-type: The function returned a value with an incorrect type.
validation.invalid-date: The date entered is not valid. Please use a correct date format.
validation.invalid-intersection-types: The input does not meet all required conditions.
validation.not-multiple-of: The value must be a multiple of {multipleOf}.
validation.not-finite: The value must be a finite number.
validation.custom-error: The input provided is invalid. Please review and correct it.

Component-Footer.copyright-notice: Next.js - NestJS - Turbo - Auth Boilerplate. All rights reserved.

Page-Home.title: Welcome to Next.js - NestJS - Turbo - Auth Boilerplate

Page-Profile.delete-profile-confirm-dialog-message: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
Page-Profile.update-profile-confirm-dialog-message: Are you sure you want to update your profile?
Page-Profile.update-profile-no-changes-toast-detail: No changes were made to your profile.
Page-Profile.loading-profile-error-toast-detail: An error occurred while loading your profile. Please try again later.
Page-Profile.update-error-409: Email or username already exists. Please choose a different one.
Page-Profile.update-error-500: An unexpected error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again later.
Page-Profile.update-error-default: An unknown error occurred while updating your profile. Please try again later.
Page-Profile.delete-profile-success-toast-detail: Your profile has been successfully deleted.
Page-Profile.update-profile-success-toast-detail: Your profile has been successfully updated.
Page-Profile.delete-profile-error-default-toast-detai: An error occurred while deleting your profile. Please try again later.

Component-Login-Credentials.title: Welcome back!
Component-Login-Credentials.error-401-403: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
Component-Login-Credentials.error-500: An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again later.
Component-Login-Credentials.error-default: An unknown error occurred while logging in. Please try again later.

Component-Login-2FA.title: Two-Factor Authentication
Component-Login-2FA.description: We have sent a two-factor authentication code to your email address. Please enter the code below to continue.
Component-Login-2FA.error-500: An unexpected error occurred while verifying your 2FA code. Please try again later.
Component-Login-2FA.error-default: An unknown error occurred while verifying your 2FA code. Please try again later.

Page-Forgot-Password.title: Reset Your Password
Page-Forgot-Password.error-401-403: Invalid email address. Please try again.
Page-Forgot-Password.error-500: An unexpected error occurred while resetting your password. Please try again later.
Page-Forgot-Password.error-default: An unknown error occurred while resetting your password. Please try again later.
Page-Forgot-Password.success-message: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

Page-Reset-Password.title: Set New Password
Page-Reset-Password.error-no-token: Token is expired or cannot be found. Please request the password reset again.
Page-Reset-Password.error-410: Token has expired. Please request the password reset again.
Page-Reset-Password.error-404: Token not found. Please request the password reset again.
Page-Reset-Password.error-500: An unexpected error occurred while setting your new password. Please try again later.
Page-Reset-Password.error-default: An unknown error occurred while setting your new password. Please try again later.
Page-Reset-Password.success-message: Your password has been successfully set. You can now log in with your new password.

Page-Register.title: Welcome
Page-Register.email-input-info: Your email address will not be publicly visible.
Page-Register.username-input-info: Your username will be publicly visible.
Page-Register.error-409: Email or username already exists. Please choose a different one.
Page-Register.error-500: An unexpected error occurred while registering. Please try again later.
Page-Register.error-default: An unknown error occurred while registering. Please try again later.
Page-Register.success-message: You have successfully registered. Please check your email to verify your account.

Page-Confirm.status-confirmed: Your account has been successfully confirmed.
Page-Confirm.status-confirmed-login-link: You can now log in here
Page-Confirm.status-error: An error occurred while confirming your account. Please try again later.
